concept.title: Defining the RPC URI
concept.shortdesc: The RPC URI is a user-defined unique identifier that allows the RPC origin and RPC destination to recognize each other.

conbody.p: RPC pipelinesRPC URIRPC URIin RPC origins and destinationsTo enable the RPC destination to write directly to the RPC origin, create a single RPC URI and use it in both stage configurations.
